general.description: Griffin III is, despite the generic name, a well-populated and prosperous world. It has a booming industrial base and a respectable government complex. The facilities are well-maintained and extensive here. Truly a model world for the Empire, even if it's a little lacking in personality.
general.bar: The bar is clean and large, with various games and vids for entertainment of patrons. The food is good and the drinks are great. One could stay a long time here.
